pages.text: $(li)Cocoa Beans can be plant in a Jungle Log to generate more Cocoa Beans.$(br)$(li)You can use Cocoa Beans to craft Chocolate Bars, Cocoa Bean Stacks, Brown Dye, Seed Pouch, or Cookies in a Crafting Table.
$(li)You can use this item as an ingredient to brew a Potion of Restfulness in a Brewing Stand.
